data.title: Tyson Chandler Injury: Updates on Suns Star's Shoulder and Return
data.meta_description: Phoenix Suns  center  Tyson Chandler  was nursing a  strained  right shoulder he suffered against the  Houston Rockets  on Feb. 19. However, he's ready to return.       Continue for updates...
data.text:
Chandler is a double-double threat anytime he steps on the floor and one of the team's primary rim protectors. His impact goes beyond the box score, as he sets the tone for the entire defense and alters plenty of shots he doesnâ€™t actually block.

Chandler helped the Dallas Mavericks win an NBA title in 2011 as a defensive anchor down low, and the hope in Phoenix when it signed him this offseason was he would do the same and lead the Suns to the postseason. Thus far, he is averaging 5.9 points, 8.5 rebounds and 0.6 blocks per game.
